desc: We want to provide kids with calming sleep, a space for creative play, a positive learning environment, and stylishly maximise floor space. Bunk, loft, floor, toddlers, teens, family beds, pegboards & more. We use only ECO-friendly, sustainably forested materials - natural wood and pressed birch.

layout.text: We design according to AS-NZS 4220 Safety standard for Bunk beds. It means high guard rails, hand grips on stairs, and openings without entrapment hazards.
